price: ئەوانمان کردە پێشە وایانێک کە (خەڵك) بانگ دەکەن بۆ ئاگری دۆزەخ وە لەڕۆژی دواییشدا یارمەتی نادرێن
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ أَئِمَّةٗ يَدۡعُونَ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِۖ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ لَا يُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnāhum a-immatan yadʿūna ilā al-nāri wayawma al-qiyāmati lā yunṣarūna
